item.title: Added Form tools, updated posthog
item.description:
https://sprig.com/ - 1 In-Product Survey or Survey with Replay per month, with GPT-powered AI Analysis.
https://feedback.fish/ - Free plan allows collecting 25 total feedback submissions. Easy to integrate with React and Vue components provided.
https://posthog.com - Full Product Analytics suite free for up to 1m tracked events per month. Also provides unlinited in-App Surveys with 250/month responses.

item.title: removed duplicated entry, extended existing description with surveys.
item.description:
https://github.com/amortka/free-for-dev/assets/8505274/a4c818b0-5d8f-4cae-b25b-4df95705054b -
https://hotjar.com) — Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. One hundred snapshots/day (max capacity: 300 - Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. One hundred snapshots/day (max capacity: 300). Three snapshot heatmaps can be stored for 365 days. Unlimited Team Members. Also in App and standalone surveys, feedback widgets with screenshots. Free tier allows creating 3 surveys & 3 feedback widgets and collecting 20 responses per month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.hotjar.com/product/surveys - In App and standalone surveys, feedback widgets with screenshots. Free tier allows creating 3 surveys & 3 feedback widgets and collecting 20 responses per month.

item.title: Add analyitcs service to the list
item.description: https://umami.is/ - Simple, fast, privacy-focused, open-source alternative to Google Analytics.

item.title: adding Yandex DataLens
item.description: https://datalens.yandex.com/ - Yandex Cloud data visualization and analysis service. The service is provided free of charge. No restrictions on the number of users and requests.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://nominatim.org/ - OpenStreetMap's free geocoding service, providing global address search functionality and reverse geocoding capabilities.

item.title: Add Nominatim, an open-source geocoding with OpenStreetMap data
item.description: https://nominatim.org/ - OpenStreetMap's free geocoding service, providing global address search functionality and reverse geocoding capabilities.

item.title: Update README.md - added mogenius to the PaaS section
item.description: https://mogenius.com - Easily build, deploy, and run services on Kubernetes. The free tier supports connecting a local Kubernetes with mogenius, enabling individual developers to create a production-like test environment on their machine.

item.title: Update gumlet.com
item.description: https://www.gumlet.com/ - Image and video hosting, processing and streaming via CDN. Provides generous free tier of 250 GB / month for videos and 30 GB / month for images.

item.title: Added Singlebase.cloud in the BaaS section
item.description: https://singlebase.cloud - SinglebaseCloud is an AI-powered all-in-one backend platform to accelerate app development. It offers tools like Vector DB, Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, and Storage, aiming to simplify backend development. Free/Starter Plan offers Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, Storage.
